mapper.insert: insert into member_table(account, password, nickname, name, email) values (#{account}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email})
insert into member_profile_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, memberId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select account from member_table where account = #{account}
select nickname from member_table where nickname = #{nickname}
select email from member_table where email = #{email}
select * from member_table where account = #{account} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update member_table set nickname = #{nickname}, name = #{name} where id = #{id}
